jeudeloie

Class NormalCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • jeudeloie.NormalCell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cell
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GooseCell, TeleportCell, TrapCell, WaitCell

    public class NormalCell
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cell
    NormalCell implements the interface Cell, and is used as a regular cell and also as a base to modify for the special cells.

    It is a class containing :

    • Its index.
    • The player occupying it.

    Author:
    Theo Plockyn & Remy Debue

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NormalCell(int idx)
      The constructor only needs the index of the cell

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canBeLeftNow()
      Checks if the cell can be left at this turn
      int getIndex()
      Gets the cell's index
      Player getPlayer()
      Gets the occupying player.
      int handleMove(int diceThrow)
      Returns the index of the cell really reached, adding special effects if needed.
      boolean isBusy()
      Checks if the cell is currently occupied.
      boolean isRetaining()
      Checks if the cell can be left at all.
      void leave()
      Is called when the player leaves the cell, thus setting the occupying player to null.
      void welcome(Player player)
      Sets the cell's new player
